DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy Deep Shaped-Field repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( DSF-rTMS ) system treatment depression .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Multi-Coil Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) Treatment Resistant Depression
DOC.criteria: Major depressive disorder ( MDD ) Mild moderate level resistance intolerance antidepressant treatment current episode . Will become pregnant study . Seizure disorder . History brain injury active CNS disease . Metal implant brain , spinal cord , ear , eye heart . Current use proconvulsant medication ( e.g. , bupropion ) . Other significant psychiatric disorder . Substance use disorder ( include caffeine nicotine ) . 7 fail treatment attempt depression one 's lifetime . Have fail clinically remit adequate trial ECT TMS .
